alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN IBERIA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES... At 625 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Breaux Bridge to near St. Martinville to near Loreauville, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Broussard, Loreauville, Cade, Coteau, Acadiana Regional Airport and Parks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
